Los_Angeles.Carrillo House:
Carrillo House was a historic house in Los Angeles, California, US. The Pico House now stands on its lot.


== History ==

One June 21, 1821, Jose Antonio Carrillo petitioned the Comisionado for a house lot near the "new Temple which is being built for the benefit of our holy religion." The lot, 40x60 varas (114x170 feet) was granted the next day. This is the only record of a grant of a house lot made between 1786 and 1836—just one real estate transfer in fifty years.
